2025 has been…rough so far, to say the least. So with the first holiday weekend of the year nigh, we’re ready for a break — and some well-earned retail therapy. And while Presidents' Day is a major sale occasion in and of itself, it might as well be called Mattress Day, since discounts on all things sleep-related are plentiful this time of year.

But bedding and mattresses aren’t the only deals you’ll find this upcoming Presidents’ Day: Whether you’re in the market for some marked-down beauty, fashion editor-approved clothing and accessories, or home décor, we have you covered with the best Presidents' Day sales taking place this weekend.

AdvertisementADVERTISEMENT

From major discounts on cozy loungewear to new sale finds at R29-reader-favorite retailers like Nordstrom, Free People, Madewell, Anthropologie, among others, this is your one-and-only place to get all the must-shop sales. (Pro tip: Presidents' Day deals are already here ahead of the long weekend, so feel free to get a head start on your shopping before the good stuff sells out.)

Presidents' Day Fashion Sales

Right now, you can get up to 60% off thousands of new sale arrivals from all your favorite brands (including UGG, Beyond Yoga, HOKA, and Caslon) at Nordstrom for a limited time.

From wardrobe basics to home essentials to tech devices, Amazon has up to 40% off pages upon pages of markdowns for Presidents' Day weekend.

Sale on sale alert! Get an extra 40% off Anthropologie's sale section (discount added in cart) during the holiday weekend.

For a limited time, take an extra 30% off Madewell's sale section with promo code SALEONSALE.

Lucky you — for this weekend only, you can get an extra 40% off Urban Outfitters' on-sale fashion, home, music, beauty, and more (discount automatically applied at checkout).

AdvertisementADVERTISEMENT

The reader-favorite destination always has gems in its sale section, and now’s a great time to fill your cart with new, cozy season markdowns. 

During the Presidents' Day Sale, take 30% off sitewide (excluding Ray-Ban, Oakley, Persol, Costa Del Mar, sale items, and contact lenses) with code SAVE30.

Take 35% off clothing sitewide (including best-selling leggings and tights) with code VDAYSALE.

Buy one, get one 50% off undergarments with code MIXMATCH50 between now and Presidents’ Day.

Take 30% off all knitted slippers with code CLOUDS through February 24.

During Vince Camuto’s Winter Sale, get up to 60% off clearance shoes, clothes, and handbags.

From now through President’s Day, you can get 25% off select Blundstone styles — just in time for snowy winter weather.

ICYMI, Ulta Beauty's sale section is a goldmine for discounted products — make this weekend your chance to snag brands like CeraVe, Dyson, Murad, Shark Beauty, and much more at a discount.

AdvertisementADVERTISEMENT

Don't sleep on Credo's sale section this weekend — especially when top brands like Tower 28, Goop, Dedcool, and more can be found at serious discounts of the original price.

Take 20% off all hair tools (excluding the Mini Styler and Chronos Max) from luxury hair tool brand GHD from February 13 to the 26.

During the Presidents' Day Savings Event, take 25% off Moon's teeth-whitening strips.

Enjoy up to 80% off Nudestix’s Too Much To Love sale assortment, which includes fan-favorite blushes, lip and cheek pencils, value sets, and more.

Right now, buy two mix-and-match products, get one free, including the bestselling Plumping Lip Glaze, Glitter & Glow Eye Shadow, and more.

Laura Geller's universally-flattering makeup is up to 65% off during Presidents' Day weekend, and you can stretch the savings by getting an extra 15% off with promo code PD15 at checkout.

Presidents' Day Sleep Sales

Take $200-$500 off Saatva mattresses during the brand’s early Presidents’ Day sale, plus steeper savings when you bundle with an adjustable base or bed frame.

During the Presidents' Day Sale, take 15% off sitewide (including 45% off bundles) between now and Presidents’ Day.

During the Presidents' Day Sale, save up to $900 on select mattresses and adjustable base sets.

During the Cozy Season Sale, get 20% off mattresses and 25% off other sleep essentials.

During the Presidents' Day Event, take 35% off the Chill Memory Foam or Chill Hybrid Mattresses. Plus, get a free Sealy Sleep Bundle when you add a mattress to cart for a limited time.

During the Presidents' Day Sale, customers can take up to 50% off all mattresses.

During the Presidents' Day Sale, take 20% off sitewide, plus get two free pillows with any mattress purchase.

During the Presidents' Day Sale, customers can enjoy up to 50% off select mattresses and get a free accessories bundle (worth $599) with your order.

During Nolah’s Winter Sale, take up to 35% off select mattresses from now until Presidents’ Day

During the Rug + Carpet Event, enjoy up to 40% off rugs (and 20% off broadloom designs) from now until Presidents’ Day.

Get up to 40% off select home items at Albany Park, now through Presidents’ Day.

During the Presidents' Day Sale, get up to 40% off hundreds of on-sale furniture styles between now and February 19.

Take 15% off sitewide (or 20% off orders of $150+) now through Presidents’ Day.

During the Presidents' Day Sale, take 20% off rugs with code WINTER, and get a second rug at 50% off.

During the Valentine’s Day Sale, take 20-25% off cozy loungewear essentials.

Take 25% off sleep essentials like alarm clocks, bedside lamps, and more during Loftie’s Valentine’s Day sale.
